vernac_cmds: Definition Majxy (x y:R) (n:nat) : R := Rmax 1 (Rmax (Rabs x) (Rabs y)) ^ (4 * S n) / INR (fact n).
Lemma Majxy_cv_R0 : forall x y:R, Un_cv (Majxy x y) 0.
unfold Un_cv in H1; unfold R_dist in H1.
cut (0 < eps / C0); [ intro | unfold Rdiv; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat; [ assumption | apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; assumption ] ].
elim (H1 (eps / C0) H3); intros N0 H4.
replace (Majxy x y n) with (C0 ^ S n / INR (fact n)).
red; intro; rewrite H6 in H0; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H0).
replace (C0 ^ n * / INR (fact n) + 0) with (C0 ^ n * / INR (fact n) - 0); [ idtac | ring ].
unfold Rdiv in H4; apply H4; assumption.
apply Rle_ge; left; apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; assumption.
red; intro; rewrite H6 in H0; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H0).
Lemma reste1_maj : forall (x y:R) (N:nat), (0 < N)%nat -> Rabs (Reste1 x y N) <= Majxy x y (pred N).

apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => Rabs (sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) * x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l)))) * y ^ (2 * (N - l))) (pred (N - k)))) ( pred N)).

apply (Rsum_abs (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) * x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l)))) * y ^ (2 * (N - l))) (pred (N - k))) (pred N)).

apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => Rabs ((-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) * x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l)))) * y ^ (2 * (N - l)))) (pred (N - k))) ( pred N)).
apply (Rsum_abs (fun l:nat => (-1) ^ S (l + n) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + n))) * x ^ (2 * S (l + n)) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l)))) * y ^ (2 * (N - l))) (pred (N - n))).
apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k)) * fact (2 * (N - l))) * C ^ (2 * S (N + k))) (pred (N - k))) (pred N)).
apply Rle_trans with (Rabs x ^ (2 * S (n0 + n)) * C ^ (2 * (N - n0))).
apply Rle_trans with (Rmax (Rabs x) (Rabs y)); apply RmaxLess2.
apply Rle_trans with (C ^ (2 * S (n0 + n)) * C ^ (2 * (N - n0))).
unfold C; apply Rle_trans with (Rmax (Rabs x) (Rabs y)).
replace (2 * S (N + n))%nat with (2 * (N - n0) + 2 * S (n0 + n))%nat.
apply INR_eq; rewrite plus_INR; do 3 rewrite mult_INR.
repeat rewrite S_INR; do 2 rewrite plus_INR; ring.
apply (fun p n m:nat => plus_le_reg_l n m p) with n.
apply Rle_ge; left; apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; apply INR_fact_lt_0.
apply Rle_ge; left; apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; apply INR_fact_lt_0.
apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k)) * fact (2 * (N - l))) * C ^ (4 * N)) (pred (N - k))) (pred N)).
rewrite mult_INR; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat; apply INR_fact_lt_0.
replace (4 * N)%nat with (2 * (2 * N))%nat; [ idtac | ring ].
apply (fun m n p:nat => mult_le_compat_l p n m).
apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => C ^ (4 * N) * Rsqr (/ INR (fact (S (N + k))))) (pred (N - k))) (pred N)).
replace (/ INR (fact (2 * S (n0 + n)) * fact (2 * (N - n0)))) with (Binomial.C (2 * S (N + n)) (2 * S (n0 + n)) / INR (fact (2 * S (N + n)))).
apply Rle_trans with (Binomial.C (2 * S (N + n)) (S (N + n)) / INR (fact (2 * S (N + n)))).
unfold Rdiv; do 2 rewrite <- (Rmult_comm (/ INR (fact (2 * S (N + n))))).
replace (2 * S (N + n) - S (N + n))%nat with (S (N + n)).
replace (2 * S (N + n) - 2 * S (n0 + n))%nat with (2 * (N - n0))%nat.
apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => INR N / INR (fact (S N)) * C ^ (4 * N)) (pred N)).
rewrite <- (scal_sum (fun _:nat => C ^ (4 * N)) (pred (N - n)) (Rsqr (/ INR (fact (S (N + n)))))).
apply Rle_trans with (Rsqr (/ INR (fact (S (N + n)))) * INR N).
rewrite Rmult_comm; unfold Rdiv; apply Rmult_le_compat_l.
pattern (/ INR (fact (S (N + n)))) at 2; rewrite <- Rmult_1_r.
apply Rle_trans with (C ^ (4 * N) / INR (fact (pred N))).
unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rmult_assoc; apply Rmult_le_compat_l.
pattern (/ INR (fact (pred N))) at 2; rewrite <- Rmult_1_r.
red; intro; rewrite H1 in H; elim (lt_irrefl _ H).
red; intro; rewrite H1 in H; elim (lt_irrefl _ H).
red; intro; rewrite H1 in H; elim (lt_irrefl _ H).
Lemma reste2_maj : forall (x y:R) (N:nat), (0 < N)%nat -> Rabs (Reste2 x y N) <= Majxy x y N.

apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => Rabs (sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) * x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l) + 1))) * y ^ (2 * (N - l) + 1)) (pred (N - k)))) ( pred N)).

apply (Rsum_abs (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) * x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l) + 1))) * y ^ (2 * (N - l) + 1)) (pred (N - k))) ( pred N)).

apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => Rabs ((-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) * x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l) + 1))) * y ^ (2 * (N - l) + 1))) (pred (N - k))) ( pred N)).
apply (Rsum_abs (fun l:nat => (-1) ^ S (l + n) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + n) + 1)) * x ^ (2 * S (l + n) + 1) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l) + 1))) * y ^ (2 * (N - l) + 1)) (pred (N - n))).
apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1) * fact (2 * (N - l) + 1)) * C ^ (2 * S (S (N + k)))) (pred (N - k))) ( pred N)).
apply Rle_trans with (Rabs x ^ (2 * S (n0 + n) + 1) * C ^ (2 * (N - n0) + 1)).
apply Rle_trans with (Rmax (Rabs x) (Rabs y)); apply RmaxLess2.
apply Rle_trans with (C ^ (2 * S (n0 + n) + 1) * C ^ (2 * (N - n0) + 1)).
unfold C; apply Rle_trans with (Rmax (Rabs x) (Rabs y)).
replace (2 * S (S (N + n)))%nat with (2 * (N - n0) + 1 + (2 * S (n0 + n) + 1))%nat.
apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1) * fact (2 * (N - l) + 1)) * C ^ (4 * S N)) (pred (N - k))) (pred N)).
rewrite mult_INR; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat; apply INR_fact_lt_0.
replace (4 * S N)%nat with (2 * (2 * S N))%nat; [ idtac | ring ].
apply (fun m n p:nat => mult_le_compat_l p n m).
apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => C ^ (4 * S N) * Rsqr (/ INR (fact (S (S (N + k)))))) (pred (N - k))) (pred N)).
replace (/ INR (fact (2 * S (n0 + n) + 1) * fact (2 * (N - n0) + 1))) with (Binomial.C (2 * S (S (N + n))) (2 * S (n0 + n) + 1) / INR (fact (2 * S (S (N + n))))).
apply Rle_trans with (Binomial.C (2 * S (S (N + n))) (S (S (N + n))) / INR (fact (2 * S (S (N + n))))).
unfold Rdiv; do 2 rewrite <- (Rmult_comm (/ INR (fact (2 * S (S (N + n)))))).
replace (2 * S (S (n0 + n)))%nat with (S (2 * S (n0 + n) + 1)).
replace (2 * S (S (N + n)) - S (S (N + n)))%nat with (S (S (N + n))).
replace (2 * S (S (N + n)) - (2 * S (n0 + n) + 1))%nat with (2 * (N - n0) + 1)%nat.
apply Rle_trans with (sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => INR N / INR (fact (S (S N))) * C ^ (4 * S N)) (pred N)).
rewrite <- (scal_sum (fun _:nat => C ^ (4 * S N)) (pred (N - n)) (Rsqr (/ INR (fact (S (S (N + n))))))).
apply Rle_trans with (Rsqr (/ INR (fact (S (S (N + n))))) * INR N).
rewrite Rmult_comm; unfold Rdiv; apply Rmult_le_compat_l.
pattern (/ INR (fact (S (S (N + n))))) at 2; rewrite <- Rmult_1_r.
apply Rle_trans with (C ^ (4 * S N) / INR (fact N)).
unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rmult_assoc; apply Rmult_le_compat_l.
apply Rle_trans with (INR (S (S N)) * (/ INR (S (S N)) * (/ INR (S N) * / INR (fact N))) * INR N).
left; apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; apply lt_INR_0; apply lt_O_Sn.
left; apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; apply lt_INR_0; apply lt_O_Sn.
apply le_trans with (S N); apply le_n_Sn.
apply Rle_trans with (/ INR (S N) * / INR (fact N) * INR (S N)).

apply prod_neq_R0; [ apply not_O_INR; discriminate | apply INR_fact_neq_0 ].
Lemma reste1_cv_R0 : forall x y:R, Un_cv (Reste1 x y) 0.
unfold Un_cv in H; unfold R_dist in H.
elim (H eps H0); intros N0 H1.
unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_0; rewrite Rplus_0_r.
apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rabs (Majxy x y (pred n))).
replace (Majxy x y (pred n)) with (Majxy x y (pred n) - 0); [ idtac | ring ].
apply lt_le_trans with (S N0); [ apply lt_O_Sn | assumption ].
Lemma reste2_cv_R0 : forall x y:R, Un_cv (Reste2 x y) 0.
unfold Un_cv in H; unfold R_dist in H.
elim (H eps H0); intros N0 H1.
unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_0; rewrite Rplus_0_r.
apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rabs (Majxy x y n)).
replace (Majxy x y n) with (Majxy x y n - 0); [ idtac | ring ].
unfold ge; apply le_trans with (S N0).
Lemma reste_cv_R0 : forall x y:R, Un_cv (Reste x y) 0.
set (An := fun n:nat => Reste2 x y n).
set (Bn := fun n:nat => Reste1 x y (S n)).
cut (Un_cv (fun n:nat => An n - Bn n) (0 - 0) -> Un_cv (fun N:nat => Reste2 x y N - Reste1 x y (S N)) 0).
replace (fun n:nat => Reste2 x y n) with (Reste2 x y).
unfold Un_cv in H0; unfold R_dist in H0.
elim (H0 eps H1); intros N0 H2.
unfold ge; apply le_trans with (S N0).
Theorem cos_plus : forall x y:R, cos (x + y) = cos x * cos y - sin x * sin y.
cut (Un_cv (C1 x y) (cos x * cos y - sin x * sin y)).
apply UL_sequence with (C1 x y); assumption.
unfold Un_cv in H4; unfold Un_cv in H5; unfold Un_cv in H6.
unfold R_dist in H4; unfold R_dist in H5; unfold R_dist in H6.
cut (0 < eps / 3); [ intro | unfold Rdiv; apply Rmult_lt_0_compat; [ assumption | apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; prove_sup0 ] ].
apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rabs (A1 x n * A1 y n - cos x * cos y) + Rabs (sin x * sin y - B1 x (pred n) * B1 y (pred n) + Reste x y (pred n))).

replace (A1 x n * A1 y n - B1 x (pred n) * B1 y (pred n) + Reste x y (pred n) - (cos x * cos y - sin x * sin y)) with (A1 x n * A1 y n - cos x * cos y + (sin x * sin y - B1 x (pred n) * B1 y (pred n) + Reste x y (pred n))); [ apply Rabs_triang | ring ].
unfold ge; apply le_trans with N.
apply le_trans with (max (max N1 N2) N3).
apply le_trans with (S (max (max N1 N2) N3)); apply le_n_Sn.
apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rabs (sin x * sin y - B1 x (pred n) * B1 y (pred n)) + Rabs (Reste x y (pred n))).
unfold ge; apply le_trans with (max N1 N2).
apply le_trans with (max (max N1 N2) N3).
replace (Reste x y (pred n)) with (Reste x y (pred n) - 0).
apply le_trans with (max (max N1 N2) N3).
pattern eps at 4; replace eps with (3 * (eps / 3)).
